page.title: 01Block overview
page.content: The block under review includes the villages of Iwade, Bobbing, Howt Green, Kemsley and Grovehurst and a section of Milton Regis including Quinton. The area is mainly agricultural region north of the town of Sittingbourne. The village of Iwade is more of the traditional type of residential development. It has a primary school, church, village hall and some basic trading facilities. While Bobbing and Howt Green are more ribbon development along the A249 road. Kemsley was built to house the workers from the nearby { {Bowaters Paper Mill.}It has a good hall and also some basic trading facilities. Finally Milton and Quinton are residential areas forming the northern fringe of the Sittingbourne urban sprawl.
